reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here most of the first week in August 2013 , and have nothing but good things to say about the "can do" attitude of Jost and the rest of the staffers at the Adelante. Good restaurants in all price ranges are within walking distance, and hotel is close to Museum Island, The Reichstag, and other popular tourist destinations. The weather was warm to very hot most of the days we stayed and the comfortable air conditioned rooms were a welcome retreat after long days on our feet.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here half-term 29th Oct for four nights. Excellent value for money. Comfortable, quiet room. Nice decor and ample amenities. Excellent location very close to Friedrich Strasse which is a good central location. Lots of restaurants close by and easy walking distance to the centre of Berlin and all attractions. The breakfast was competitively priced and was good value for money - it also served good quality food. Staff were extremely accommodating even telephoned me beforehand when I had a query regarding flight details. Very pleased with the standard of service provided and would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to other people.
reviews.title: Excellent, quiet hotel in central Berlin

reviews.text: This is not the most glamorous hotel, but location, staff, price, size, and breakfast make it for me, at least, the perfect place to stay, whenever I return to Berlin. The staff is really very fine; the breakfast was just as good; the hotel, located on a side street, has no noise around it. Beds and bath are ample. Above all, this very modest sized place is small enough that you feel like you are at home. Restaurants near by are as satisfying. 20 minutes by foot to almost any place, from Pergamon to Brandenburg Tor.
reviews.title: I intend to come back here time and again, sehr gemütlich!

reviews.text: Great location, close to museum island and other attractions, 2 min from metro.The hotel is managed by a family which pays attention to every detail - beautiful design, caring staff, large, clean and comfortable room with Coffee/Tea maker, iron, safe and bath amenities.The breakfast was good. We used special shuttle to the airport- fast and comfy. Good value for your money and we would return here again!
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Adelante is a good value for the price. in the heart of Mitte, you will find all needs nearby or a short walk away - mini market, coffee houses, restaurants, public transport. You can find cheaper room but here you get more and do not have to worry about being disappointed. Very clean, Quite, (on a street that is not so busy), a comfy bed, ample space, tastefully decorated, with all amenities - free internet, tv, hot water maker, hair dryer, clothing iron, mini refrigerator, digital locking safe.
reviews.title: Great room with great service in a good location

Very nice. Somewhat expensive
reviews.text: I stay here again if ever I want to be in Mitte, Berlin.

My friend and I did a mini Europe trip last week and stayed at Adelante for our stop in Berlin. We were beyond pleased with this hotel; from the staff, to the space, breakfast, location, and cleanliness we could seriously have not asked for more. The hotel is situated in the perfect location and only a five minute walk from the S bahn. Ask Jost for restaurant or excursion recommendations and he will provide. Berlin is an incredible city and Adelante is the perfect place to stay for your travels there!
reviews.title: Luxurious boutique hotel in a great location for a great price!
